SalvageMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
SalvageMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
SalvageMission.successmessage: The artifact has been successfully retrieved

message.text: The artifact is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

SalvageMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
SalvageMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
SalvageMission.successmessage: The artifact has been successfully retrieved

message.text: The artifact is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

SalvageMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
SalvageMission.successmessage: The artifact has been successfully retrieved

message.text: The artifact is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

SalvageMission.name: Wreck salvage
SalvageMission.description: Wreck salvage mission description goes here

StatusEffect.showmessage: Receiving encrypted transmission: [PASS_3]LLL SLS SL LS LLS S LSSS LLL LSLL

message.text: The thing is now on board. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
The Hammerhead is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

CargoMission.name: Explosive cargo
CargoMission.description: A local arms dealer is offering 500 credits in exchange for delivering two crates of high explosives to a customer in [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: The explosives have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Chemical shipment
CargoMission.description: Reseachers of [location1] need someone to deliver some dangerous chemicals to [location2] for a reward of [reward] credits.
CargoMission.successmessage: The chemicals have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Biohazard
CargoMission.description: Local researchers are offering [reward] credits for delivering a container of husk parasite eggs to [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: The husk eggs have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Handle with care
CargoMission.description: Local researchers are offering [reward] credits for delivering a large amount of nitroglycerin to [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: The chemicals have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Praise the Honkmother
CargoMission.description: A local clown syndicate is offering [reward] credits for delivering a shipment of clowning supplies to [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: The clown gear has been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Mining outpost material transport
CargoMission.description: A consignment of materials for construction needs to be transported to [location2] and the crew chief here is prepared to pay [reward] credits for your trouble.
CargoMission.successmessage: The materials have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Mining outpost material transport
CargoMission.description: The security team at [location2] needs to be resupplied with materials for weapon fabrication. There's [reward] credits for you if you get these supplies to them.
CargoMission.successmessage: The materials have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Medical item transport
CargoMission.description: A consignment of medical items needs to be transported to [location2]. There's [reward] credits if you can get them there.
CargoMission.successmessage: The materials have been successfully delivered.

CargoMission.name: Medical item transport
CargoMission.description: A crew member over at [location2] has gone and get themselves a nasty case of morbusine poisoning. They might stand a chance of survival if you can get a shipment of antidote to them ASAP... You'll be paid [reward] credits on delivery.
CargoMission.successmessage: The antidote has been successfully delivered.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting quartz
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the quartz deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough quartz. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting pyromorphite
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the pyromorphite deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough pyromorphite. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting uranium ore
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the uranium deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough uranium. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting thorianite
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the thorianite deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough thorianite. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

MineralMission.name: Collecting titanite
MineralMission.successmessage: The existence of the titanite deposits has been successfully proven.

message.text: You have collected enough titanite. Bring them to an outpost to claim the reward.

CombatMission.name: Search and Destroy
CombatMission.descriptionneutral: A Coalition vessel has been dispatched from [location1] to destroy a renegade vessel at the outskirts of [location2].
CombatMission.description1: A renegade vessel has been detected at the outskirts of [location2]. Treason against the Europa Coalition is punishable by death - eliminate the renegades by any means necessary.
CombatMission.description2: You're a member of a renegade group opposing the Europa Coalition. According to your informants at [location1], a Coalition vessel has just been dispatched on a mission to take down your boat. Eliminate their crew by any means necessary.
CombatMission.successmessage: The [loser] vessel has been defeated by the [winner] crew!

EscortMission.name: Personnel Transport
EscortMission.description: Transport personnel safely to the next station. Payment scales with the number of transported personnel.

EscortMission.name: VIP Transport
EscortMission.description: Transport the VIP and their armed escort to the next station.

EscortMission.name: Prisoner Transport
EscortMission.description: Transport the prisoners to the next station.

EscortMission.name: Terrorist Stakeout
EscortMission.description: Separatist terrorists have been hijacking ships in this sector. Our reports suggest that some of them have snuck onto your ship alongside innocent passengers. Make sure the innocent passengers make it to [location2] alive, and be ready for any hostile takeover. Get rid of any terrorists you come across.
EscortMission.successmessage: Personnel transport successful and the terrorists have been dealt with.

PirateMission.name: Pirate Vessel
PirateMission.description: A pirate vessel has been sighted in this area. Check the locations that the submarine has reportedly been patrolling, and find the vessel and eliminate its crew.
PirateMission.successmessage: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
